lead_paragraph: The Katusha World Tour cycling team have escaped suspension despite two of their riders failing drugs tests in the space of a year, the International Cycling Union (UCI) said on Tuesday after a disciplinary commission hearing.

headline.print_headline: Katusha Team Escape Suspension After Doping Tests
headline.main: Katusha Team Escape Suspension After Doping Tests

snippet: The Katusha World Tour cycling team have escaped suspension despite two of their riders failing drugs tests in the space of a year, the International Cycling Union (UCI) said on Tuesday after a disciplinary commission hearing....
